text: Infanta Marie Anne of Portugal (; 13 July 1861 – 31 July 1942) was Grand Duchess of Luxembourg as the wife of Grand Duke Guillaume IV. She was the country's regent in the name of their daughter, Grand Duchess Marie-Adélaïde. She was a member of the House of Braganza.“A fuga da família grã-ducal ”, by Margarida de Magalhães Ramalho (2019). ==References== Category:1861 births Category:1942 deaths Category:Luxembourgian princes and princesses
title: Infanta Marie Anne of Portugal
